mapper.insert: insert into sys_user_info (user_id, user_name, sex, password,employee_id, user_stat, enter_code, enter_name, dept_code, dept_name, posi_code, posi_name,dept_posi, role_code, role_name, telphone, email, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{posiCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{posiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{deptPosi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeStamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sys_user_info set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employee_id= #{employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_stat = #{userStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enter_code = #{enterCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enter_name = #{enterName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_code = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_name = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, posi_code = #{posiCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, posi_name = #{posiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_posi = #{deptPosi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_code = #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_stamp = #{timeStamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rec_stat = #{recStat,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, sex, password,employee_id, user_stat, enter_code, enter_name, dept_code, dept_name, posi_code, posi_name,dept_posi, role_code, role_name, telphone, email, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_user_info where rec_stat='0'and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select user_id, user_name, sex, password,employee_id, user_stat, enter_code, enter_name, dept_code, dept_name, posi_code, posi_name,dept_posi, role_code, role_name, telphone, email, create_date, create_time, create_user, update_date, update_time, update_user, time_stamp, rec_stat from sys_user_info

select user_id, user_name, sex, password,employee_id, user_stat, enter_code, enter_name, dept_code, dept_name, posi_code, posi_name,dept_posi, role_code, role_name, telphone, email from sys_user_info where user_stat='0' and rec_stat='0' and role_code like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{roleCode}),'%')

select user_id, user_name, sex, employee_id, user_stat, enter_code, enter_name, dept_code, dept_name, posi_code, posi_name,dept_posi, role_code, role_name, telphone, email from sys_user_info where employee_id=#{employeeId}

select u.user_id, u.user_name, p.CUST_NO, n.cust_nam as CONTACT_NAM, to_char(p.birth_date, 'mm-dd') birth_date,
e.event_type,e.event_date,
u.employee_id, (select PHONE_NO1 from ec_contact_way c where c.cust_no = p.cust_no and c.rec_stat = '0' and c.PHONE_NO1 is not null and rownum=1) as PHONE_NO1 from sys_user_info u, ec_cust_per p,ec_cust_manager m,
ec_cust_event e,
ec_cust_name n
where u.employee_id = m.CUST_AGENT and p.cust_no = m.cust_no and p.cust_no = n.cust_no and p.cust_stat='0' and p.rec_stat='0' and m.rec_stat='0'
and to_char(p.birth_date,'mm-dd') = substr(#{birthDate},6,5)
and e.cust_no = p.cust_no and e.event_type = #{eventType} and e.event_date = #{eventDate}
